name: ClaimReportType
title: Claim Report Type
description: Types of reports filed or obtained in connection with a claim.

concept.definition: An official report filed by law enforcement documenting an incident, theft, or accident.
An official report from the fire department documenting the origin, cause, and extent of a fire.
An internal or third-party report documenting the details of an occurrence or event.
A valuation report documenting the assessed value of damaged or destroyed property.
A report from a healthcare provider documenting injuries, treatment, and prognosis.
A report from emergency medical services documenting on-scene care and patient transport.

designation.value: Reporte de servicios médicos de emergencia

concept.definition: A technical report from a subject-matter specialist (engineer, forensic analyst, etc.).
